name: TrainZit: 1 (Attack of the Mallows at RanRed station)
name_original: TrainZit: 1 (Attack of the Mallows at RanRed station)
description:
(there was some un-expected issues with the web build so I removed it)

This project was created for the Mario Fan Games Galaxy winter jam 2021.

W,A,S,,D > Movement              MOUSE> shoot

SHIFT > run                                     E > Interact

SPACE > jump                            

 My game is not a fan game of Mario :). I originally wanted to recreate my favorite zombie's map and downgrade it to look like the ps1. This game is now a reflection of the original idea. my zombies fell through and I decided to switch to a marshmallow rather than trying to model a zombie in such a short time :)

        All of the assets In my game are free/available for everyone OR made by me within the period of the game jam.

       Base Player Controller:  crazy_stewie (Godot asset library)

      Sound fx: Kenny.nl

      gun model: Kenny.nl

      textures: Textures.com (all are available with a free account)

There is a secret spot that will make you rich ;)
